actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the treatment of certain shale oil property as energy property for purposes of the energy investment credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the eligibility of shale oil property used for hydrogenation (or for a similar process subsequent to retorting) for the ten percent energy investment tax credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the treatment of certain shale oil property as energy property for purposes of the energy investment credit.
